name: Dion M. JETTER, Appellant, v. SECRETARY OF CORRECTIONS FOR PENNSYLVANIA, Jeffrey A. Beard, PH.D., et al., Appellees

parties: Dion M. JETTER, Appellant, v. SECRETARY OF CORRECTIONS FOR PENNSYLVANIA, Jeffrey A. Beard, PH.D., et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of October, 2002, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
809 A.2d 243
Dion M. JETTER, Appellant, v. SECRETARY OF CORRECTIONS FOR PENNSYLVANIA, Jeffrey A. Beard, PH.D., et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 22, 2002.
